data.message: Looking forward to your new album. Fuck the haters like it bothers you anyways they say respect those who respect you well Donald J. Trump dont have no respect for no one I tried to share your campaign speech song even before he got elected and I love how you bashed him in your new song by the way Boston hates Trump so if you would like a new cool place to move to please be free to join us. Hope your really coming to #Boston tickets will probably be gone tho before I get a chance to purchase one but I'm really looking forward to going to one of your concerts your a real inspiration and I always listen to your music when I'm sad or angry. I think your a great musician who came a very long way with a lot of hard work and dedication love always Angie

replies.message: Sorry I dont ride Eminem s dick what you jealous over my comment loser!
